meta_data_schema.name: language
meta_data_schema.description: Language for speech synthesis. Default: en

meta_data_schema.name: speed_alpha
meta_data_schema.description: Speed control factor. Default: 1.0

meta_data_schema.name: reduce_latency
meta_data_schema.description: Enable reduced latency mode. Default: false

meta_data_schema.name: pause_between_brackets
meta_data_schema.description: Insert pauses at bracketed text. Default: false

meta_data_schema.name: phonemize_between_brackets
meta_data_schema.description: Phonemize text between brackets. Default: false

meta_data_schema.name: base_url
meta_data_schema.description: API base URL. Default: https://api.sarvam.ai

meta_data_schema.name: language
meta_data_schema.description: Language for speech synthesis. Default: en

meta_data_schema.name: pitch
meta_data_schema.description: Pitch adjustment. Range: -0.75 to 0.75. Default: 0.0

meta_data_schema.name: pace
meta_data_schema.description: Speech pace multiplier. Range: 0.3 to 3.0. Default: 1.0

meta_data_schema.name: loudness
meta_data_schema.description: Loudness level. Range: 0.1 to 3.0. Default: 1.0

meta_data_schema.name: enable_preprocessing
meta_data_schema.description: Enable text preprocessing. Default: false

meta_data_schema.name: temperature
meta_data_schema.description: Temperature for generation. Range: 0.01 to 1.0. Default: 0.6

meta_data_schema.name: language
meta_data_schema.description: Language for speech synthesis. Default: en

meta_data_schema.name: latency
meta_data_schema.description: Latency mode: normal or low. Default: normal

meta_data_schema.name: normalize
meta_data_schema.description: Enable text normalization. Default: true

meta_data_schema.name: prosody_speed
meta_data_schema.description: Prosody speed multiplier. Default: 1.0

meta_data_schema.name: prosody_volume
meta_data_schema.description: Prosody volume adjustment. Default: 0

voices.name: Alice - Clear, Engaging Educator

voices.name: Matilda - Knowledgable, Professional

voices.name: Will - Relaxed Optimist

voices.name: Jessica - Playful, Bright, Warm
voices.description: Young and popular, this playful American female voice is perfect for trendy content.

voices.name: Eric - Smooth, Trustworthy
voices.description: A smooth tenor pitch from a man in his 40s - perfect for agentic use cases.

voices.name: Bella - Professional, Bright, Warm
voices.description: This voice is warm, bright, and professional, characterized by a Standard American accent and a polished, narrative quality. It features a medium-high pitch with crisp diction and a deliberate, rhythmic pace that makes it highly intelligible and engaging for long-form listening.

voices.name: Chris - Charming, Down-to-Earth
voices.description: Natural and real, this down-to-earth voice is great across many use-cases.

voices.name: Brian - Deep, Resonant and Comforting
voices.description: Middle-aged man with a resonant and comforting tone. Great for narrations and advertisements.

voices.name: Daniel - Steady Broadcaster
voices.description: A strong voice perfect for delivering a professional broadcast or news story.

voices.name: Lily - Velvety Actress
voices.description: Velvety British female voice delivers news and narrations with warmth and clarity.

voices.name: Adam - Dominant, Firm
voices.description: A bright tenor pitch that immediately cuts through. The delivery is brash and openly confident, speaking with unwavering certainty and a slightly aggressive self-assurance.

voices.name: Bill - Wise, Mature, Balanced
voices.description: Friendly and comforting voice ready to narrate your stories.

voices.name: Pirate Captain
voices.description: A rough, charismatic pirate captain with a booming voice and a mischievous laugh, full of sea slang and swagger.

voices.name: British Butler
voices.description: A polite, refined British butler with impeccable diction and a dry wit, speaking calmly and respectfully.

voices.name: Cartoon Villain
voices.description: A flamboyant cartoon villain with dramatic flair, gleefully evil but funny, with exaggerated intonation.

voices.name: Medieval Knight
voices.description: A noble knight with a deep, commanding voice and chivalric honor, speaking with high medieval grandeur

voices.name: Childlike Cartoon Hero
voices.description: A cheerful young cartoon hero, full of energy, optimism, and slightly exaggerated speech patterns with young voice.

voices.name: Space Commander
voices.description: A disciplined, fearless space commander. Firm tone, tactical phrasing, bold and reassuring. Resolute but inspiring.

voices.name: Radio DJ
voices.description: A lively radio DJ with charisma and rhythm. Smooth transitions, upbeat pacing, and a smile audible through every word.

voices.name: Noir Detective
voices.description: A weary detective with a gravelly voice and slow drawl. Cynical but sharp, like a man who’s seen too much and trusts too little.

voices.name: Movie Trailer Voice
voices.description: A deep, cinematic trailer narrator. Resonant voice with perfect pacing, bold emphasis, and rising suspense. Speaks with awe and gravity.

voices.name: Supervillain (Comic Style)
voices.description: A booming, theatrical supervillain voice. Grand, mocking, filled with gleeful menace and unstoppable arrogance.

voices.name: Sports Commentator
voices.description: An excited sports announcer with sharp articulation and electric energy. Full of momentum, cheering tone, and lively reactions.

voices.name: ASMR Whisperer
voices.description: A soft, breathy ASMR voice. Gentle enunciation, calm pauses, and whispering rhythm to create a deeply relaxing tone.

voices.name: News Anchor
voices.description: A clear, professional news anchor voice. Balanced pacing, confident tone, and neutral warmth suited for global audiences.

voices.name: Anime Protagonist Girl
voices.description: A cheerful, determined teenage anime heroine with bright energy and emotional range. Slightly high-pitched, passionate, and expressive.

voices.name: Drill Sergeant
voices.description: A powerful, booming voice that commands instant attention. The texture is rough, gravelly, and projects with intense volume and clipped, sharp enunciation. Every syllable is delivered with aggressive authority, designed to motivate through intimidation. The pace is rapid, leaving no room for hesitation, conveying urgency and unwavering discipline. The overall impression is one of absolute control

voices.name: Crazy Scientist
voices.description: An eccentric, manic scientist, male or female, speaking fast with bursts of energy, laughter, and excitement. Tone conveys chaotic genius, curiosity, and obsessive passion. Words tumble over one another, filled with dramatic highs and occasional self-amusement. Perfect for humorous, intense, or imaginative scenarios.

voices.name: The Documentarian
voices.description: Expressive voice for documentaries and storytelling

voices.name: The Brand Storyteller
voices.description: Conversational voice for ads and brand films

voices.name: The Presenter
voices.description: Clear, energetic voice for podcasts and news

voices.name: The Corporate Explainer
voices.description: Polished, trustworthy voice for corporate explainers and e-learning

voices.name: The Global Connector
voices.description: Smooth international voice for multilingual videos

voices.name: The Vision Builder
voices.description: Charismatic, persuasive voice for campaign videos and pitch decks

voices.name: The Game Voice
voices.description: Expressive, versatile voice for character dialogue or game cut-scenes

voices.name: The Gentle Narrator
voices.description: Calm, immersive voice for audiobooks and bedtime stories

meta_data_schema.description: Language for speech synthesis

voices.name: Nyomi
voices.description: Female voice with an informative, clinical tone, which can be used for newscasting and informative content. This voice delivers facts with clarity and precision, maintaining a professional and authoritative presence. Suitable for news reports, documentaries, and educational material that require a composed and objective delivery.

voices.name: Griffin
voices.description: Neutral, focused, authoritative, and calm male voice, with strategic emphasis on key points to highlight important information. Ideal for corporate presentations, educational content, or instructional videos, this voice ensures clarity and engagement while drawing attention to essential details.

voices.name: Corbin
voices.description: Well-articulated male voice with a clear and factual tone, emphasizing key words for impact. Ideal for documentaries, presentations, and educational content that requires precision and authority.

voices.name: Faith
voices.description: Calm, neutral-tone female voice that is soothing and professional. This voice is well-suited for corporate presentations, meditation guides, or customer service applications, where a balanced and composed tone is necessary to ensure clear communication while keeping the listener at ease.

voices.name: Grace
voices.description: Upbeat female Australian voice with an inviting delivery and positive energy, perfect for friendly and informative presentations, commercials, and promotional content.

voices.name: Suraj
voices.description: Male voice with an Indian accent, delivering content in a natural, unpretentious, and conversational style. Perfect for podcasts, storytelling, and informal interviews, where a relaxed and engaging tone helps foster a connection with the audience, making the content feel personal and relatable.

voices.name: Alden
voices.description: Male voice with an intense, commanding tone of authority, perfect for character and movie trailer narration. His strong presence and powerful delivery create a sense of urgency and dominance, making him ideal for roles that require confidence and intensity.

voices.name: Violet
voices.description: Calm and neutral female voice with a moderate pace, providing information in a clear and approachable manner. This voice is well-suited for tutorials, explainer videos, or customer service applications, where a reassuring, steady tone is needed to convey information effectively without overwhelming the listener.

voices.name: Joel
voices.description: British male voice with an informative, educational style, delivering content in a balanced, professional, and direct manner. Perfect for e-learning courses, corporate training, instructional videos, and educational presentations, offering clear, authoritative communication that engages the audience while maintaining a focus on the message.

voices.name: Xavier
voices.description: Calm, measured voice with a smooth and steady delivery. Ideal for narrations, guided tutorials, and professional presentations where clarity, composure, and a polished tone create an engaging and easy-to-follow listening experience.
